text: aur musharekeen kahate hain ki agar khuda chaahata to na ham hee usake siva kisee aur cheez kee ibaadat karate aur na hamaare baap daada aur na ham bagair us (kee marzee) ke kisee cheez ko haraam kar baithate jo log inase pahale ho guzare hain vah bhee aise (heela havaale kee) baaten kar chuke hain to (kaha karen) paigambaron par to usake siva ki ehakaam ko saaph saaph pahuncha de aur kuchh bhee nahin
